name: Project
description: The organisation is part of the project developing a specification for this dataset

name: Prospective data
description: The organisation is responsible for data covered by this prospective specificaton

name: Expected data
description: The organisation should provide data to this specification as a member of a project

name: Encouraged data
description: The organisation should provide data to this standard

name: Statutory data
description: The organisation must provide data to this standard as a statutory duty

name: Authoritative source
description: The organisation is the authoritative source of this data

name: Alternative source
description: The organisation provides data which can help verify this data
